long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Text Reader is a powerful and easy-to-use browser extension designed to seamlessly read aloud copied text for you. Whether you're multitasking, studying, or simply want a hands-free reading experience, this tool provides clear and uninterrupted text-to-speech functionality. It reads any copied text and lets you download the text for offline listening, ideal for enhancing productivity and accessibility.

Key Features:
Seamless Text-to-Speech: Read any copied text with one click, providing natural and continuous playback even when switching tabs.
Play, Pause, and Resume: Enjoy full playback control, allowing you to pause and resume whenever you need.
Clipboard Access: Instantly reads from the clipboard for a quick and user-friendly experience.

Perfect for students, professionals, or anyone looking to boost productivity and accessibility, Persistent Text Reader is your reliable companion for efficient, distraction-free listening on the go.
